media.altText: Image promoting MAED lip care. Text reads: “Swipe on MAED. Luxe lip care that smooths, hydrates, and visibly fades dark spots. SHOP NOW.” Four lip products shown: two gold tubes, one red tube, and one white tube with red text.
Image promoting M.PH by Mary Phillips. Text reads: “Ace this celeb makeup artist’s viral underpainting technique. Only at Sephora. SHOP NOW.” Includes woman set against a clean, minimal background.
Trending Picks | Find your next lip and cheek obsession. SHOP NOW >
NEW FROM NARS | Meet the Explicit Lipstick: a luxurious, refillable formula that lasts all day. SHOP NOW >
NEW FROM YVES SAINT LAURENT | Swipe on this hydrating, oil-based lipstick that shines like a gloss. SHOP NOW >
SAVE 5% WITH AUTO-REPLENISH^^ | Never run out of lipstick with subscription delivery. LEARN MORE > | 5% OFF^^ | ^^Terms apply. | Icon of blue cleanser bottle.

seoContent: Looking for lipstick? We’re here to help. From +[red lipstick|/red-lipstick]+ to +[nude lipstick|/nude-lipstick]+, plumping to high shine, our lipsticks will help create the perfect look. Make a bold statement with your perfect [matte red lipstick|/red-matte-lipstick], or find your perfect every day shade in a variety of finishes.
seoMetaDescription: Shop the best lipsticks now at Sephora and earn points with every purchase! Not yet a Beauty Insider? Join now for FREE!
